Instance Method# intersects(sphereOrigin:sphereRadius:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
func intersects(
    sphereOrigin: Point3DFloat,
    sphereRadius: Float
) -> Bool
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Spatial/Ray3DFloat/intersects(sphereOrigin:sphereRadius:)#parameters)

`sphereOrigin`A point structure that defines the center of the sphere.

`sphereRadius`The radius of the sphere.

## [Return Value](/documentation/Spatial/Ray3DFloat/intersects(sphereOrigin:sphereRadius:)#return-value)

A Boolean value that indicates whether the ray intersects the sphere.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Spatial/Ray3DFloat/intersects(sphereOrigin:sphereRadius:)#discussion)

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the ray intersects a specified sphere.
